Code Companion.description: Shared code-editor application that lets you invite people to your document via a invite code.

Sharify.title: Spotify songs sharing app
Sharify.description: A song sharing service that enables sharing of playlists from Spotify to main feed in the form of posts.

About.paragraph: I am a Software Developer with extensive experience in building full-stack web applications. I'm highly capable and an avid advocate for building clean software that lasts for a long time. I also like to play piano and video games.
